resources.title: Welcome Email Template
resources.description: Friendly welcome email for new users. Includes introduction and getting started guide.
resources.content:
Subject: Welcome to Dawid.AI - Your AI Writing Assistant! üéâ

Hi there!

Welcome to Dawid.AI! We're excited to have you join thousands of users who are already supercharging their online writing with AI.

Here's what you can do:
‚Ä¢ Generate thoughtful replies to social media posts
‚Ä¢ Summarize long articles in seconds
‚Ä¢ Rewrite text in any style
‚Ä¢ Translate content to multiple languages

Get started in 3 easy steps:
1. Add your API key in Settings
2. Select text on any webpage
3. Right-click and choose a prompt

Need help? Check out our documentation or reach out anytime.

Happy writing!
The Dawid.AI Team

---

P.S. This email template is customizable - add your affiliate tracking link!
resources.usageHint: Personalize with your affiliate link and send to new signups

resources.title: LinkedIn Professional Post

resources.content:
‚ö° Boost Your Online Communication with AI

Key benefits:
‚Ä¢ Generate thoughtful responses in seconds
